body.p: The 2010 and 2013 Exposure Drafts would not have precluded an entity from applying the leases requirements at a portfolio level. However, many entities noted that the 2011 Exposure Draft Revenue from Contracts with Customers proposed guidance on applying its requirements at a portfolio level (which has subsequently been confirmed in IFRS 15). These stakeholders asked whether the absence of guidance on this subject meant that an entity would not be permitted to apply IFRS 16 at a portfolio level.
